content_1: Bangladesh. Two outbreaks from Bangladesh were reported this week to OIE. 154 birds died in an outbreak that began on April 11 and ended April 15 at Kosha khali poultry complex in Dhaka. An additional 2,346 birds were culled. The other outbreak took place May 9 and 10 on the Al-Akbar poultry farm in Chittagong. 180 birds died and 1,820 were culled.
